articles.title: Man stabs at least 10 on Tokyo train, starts fire...
articles.description: TOKYO (AP) — A man brandishing a knife on a Tokyo commuter train on Sunday stabbed several passengers before setting a fire, police said. NHK public television said at least 10 passengers were injured, including one seriously.
